doc.field: Marilyn Symmes collection of art exhibition ephemera
Marilyn Symmes collection of art exhibition ephemera

Includes material from artists, among others, John Ganis, Adrian Ghenie, Bruce Gilden, John Giorno, Joseph Glasco, Leon Golub, John Graham, Rodney Graham, John Grillo, Wang Guangle, and Andreas Gursky. Also includes an information sheet from the ICA in Philadelphia on its exhibition, "Rudi Gernreich: Fashion Will Never Go Out of Fashion." Also includes a card from the June Kelly Gallery on the exhibition, "Joan Giordano: Woven in Time, Constructions & Mixed Media" with an explanation of the artist's work. Includes a Barnes Foundation brochure on the William Glackens exhibition. Also includes a catalogue from the exhibition, "Michael Goldberg: End to End, The 1950's & 2000s." Also includes a Michael Rosenfeld Gallery Frieze Masters: Spotlight on "Nancy Grossman, The 1960's."
Marilyn Symmes collection of art exhibition ephemera
Series I. Single Artist Exhibitions >> G (Set 2)
